comment.author: 8793648@N06
comment._content: Looking east back towards Punchbowl. I've yet to see a photo looking to the west! Wiki page at en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bankstown_railway_station,_Sydney

comment.author: 37556960@N06
comment._content:
Opsbook , Looking at the trackplan at the time ( at the exhibition in Bankstown Library) this was the end of the line with only a short section of track behind the photographer for running round trains.

D.
